title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.19 - Photography
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.19 - Photography

State Regulations

The taking of photographs or moving pictures within the
parkway system is prohibited except at designated parking areas, unless
authorized under an agreement with the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
